00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  *  @brief   TSP solver and Lin-Kernighan heuristic.
00003  *
00004  *  Wrapper for calling Concorde's TSP solver and Lin-Kernighan heuristic.
00005  *
00006  *  @author  John LaRusic
00007  *  @ingroup lib
00008  ****************************************************************************/
00009 #include "arrow.h"
00010 
00011 void
00012 arrow_tsp_result_init(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_tsp_result *result)
00013 {
00014     if(!arrow_util_create_int_array(problem->size, &(result->tour)))
00015         result = NULL;
00016     result->found_tour = ARROW_FALSE;
00017     result->tour_length = -1.0;
00018     result->total_time = 0.0;
00019 }
00020 
00021 void 
00022 arrow_tsp_result_destruct(arrow_tsp_result *result)
00023 {
00024     if(result->tour != NULL)
00025         free(result->tour);
00026 }
00027 
00028 void
00029 arrow_tsp_lk_params_default(arrow_problem *problem,
00030                             arrow_tsp_lk_params *params)
00031 {
00032     
00033 }
00034 
00035 int 
00036 arrow_tsp_exact_solve(arrow_problem *problem, int *in_tour, 
00037                       arrow_tsp_result *result)
00038 {
00039     int ret;
00040     int success;
00041     double start_time, end_time;
00042     CCrandstate rstate;
00043     
00044     CCutil_sprand((int)CCutil_real_zeit(), &rstate);
00045     start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00046     ret = CCtsp_solve_dat(
00047             problem->size,          // int ncount
00048             &(problem->data),       // CCdatagroup *indat
00049             in_tour,                // int *in_tour
00050             result->tour,           // int *out_tour
00051             NULL,                   // double *in_val
00052             &(result->tour_length), // double *optval
00053             &success,               // int *success
00054             &(result->found_tour),  // int *foundtour
00055             problem->name,          // char *name
00056             NULL,                   // double *timebound
00057             NULL,                   // int *hit_timebound
00058             1,                      // int silent
00059             &rstate                 // CCrandstate *rstate
00060         );
00061     
00062     end_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00063     result->total_time = end_time - start_time;
00064         
00065     if(result->found_tour && success)
00066         return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00067     else if(!result->found_tour && success)
00068         return ARROW_ERROR_NON_FATAL;
00069     else
00070         return ARROW_ERROR_FATAL;
00071 }
